Package com.example.aurora.notifications

Class FirestoreNotificationHelper

java.lang.Object
com.example.aurora.notifications.FirestoreNotificationHelper
public class FirestoreNotificationHelper extends Object
Utility class for sending notifications AND logging them.

  • Method Details

    • sendIfAllowed

      public static void sendIfAllowed(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String email, NotificationModel nm)

    • sendWaitingListNotification

      public static void sendWaitingListNotification(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String userIdentifier, String eventName, String eventId, String organizerEmail)
      Sends a notification to a user informing them that they are on the waiting list. Also logs the action in "notificationLogs".
      Parameters:
      db - Firestore instance
      userIdentifier - email or Firestore UID
      eventName - readable event title
      eventId - Firestore event document ID
      organizerEmail - organizer performing the action

    • sendSelectedListNotification

      public static void sendSelectedListNotification(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String userIdentifier, String eventName, String eventId, String organizerEmail)
      Notifies a user that they have been selected for an event.
      Parameters:
      db - Firestore instance
      userIdentifier - email or document ID
      eventName - event name
      eventId - event ID
      organizerEmail - organizer performing the action

    • sendCancelledNotification

      public static void sendCancelledNotification(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String userIdentifier, String eventName, String eventId, String organizerEmail)
      Notifies a user that their status for an event has been cancelled.
      Parameters:
      db - Firestore instance
      userIdentifier - email or document ID
      eventName - event name
      eventId - event ID
      organizerEmail - organizer performing the action

    • sendCustomNotification

      public static void sendCustomNotification(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String userIdentifier, String eventName, String eventId, String message, String organizerEmail)
      Sends a custom text message notification to a specific user.
      Parameters:
      db - Firestore instance
      userIdentifier - email or document ID
      eventName - event name
      eventId - event ID
      message - message body to send
      organizerEmail - organizer performing the action

    • logNotification

      public static void logNotification(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String organizerEmail, String eventId, String eventName, String recipientEmail, String message, String type)
      Saves a record of every notification organizers send to users.
      Parameters:
      db - Firestore instance
      organizerEmail - organizer/admin performing the action
      eventId - ID of event involved (nullable)
      eventName - name of event
      recipientEmail - user receiving the notification
      message - message content
      type - notification type

    • sendOrganizerRevokedNotification

      public static void sendOrganizerRevokedNotification(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String email)
      Sends a user-facing notification + admin log when organizer access is revoked.

    • sendOrganizerEnabledNotification

      public static void sendOrganizerEnabledNotification(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db, String email)
      Sends a notification + log when organizer access is restored.
